content.rendered:
Directed by Ruchika Oberoi.

Written by Siddharth Sharma. Bela Negi. Vineet Garg. Ruchika Oberoi.

Cast Vinay Pathak(Suyash Chaturvedi). Amruta Subhash(Sarita Joshi). Tannishtha Chatterjee(Aarti). Chandan Roy Sanyal(Jignesh). Sameer Kochhar(Purshottam). Sana Amin Sheikh(Vaidehi). Uttara Baokar(Ajji). Ashwin Mushran(CEO Ajay Sharma). Mithun Rodwittiya(Terrorist). Bhushan Vikas(Anil Joshi). Naman Banthia(Kalantri). Jaswinder Singh(Mr. Patra). Jyoti Subhash(Tea-time visitor). Mukul Chadda(Insurance MC) . Abhishek Agrawal(Stephen). Helena Fonseca(Rich Aunt). Anshul Khandelwal(Fun Committee Winner). Daisy Khatri(Aarti’s sister). Manoj Sharmaa(Salesman (as Manoj Sharma)). Gaggan Singh(Purushottam evil brother (as Gagan Nimesh)). Tomer Suraj(Printing press boss)

Language Hindi.

Producers Nina Lath Gupta. Nfdc India. Sumit Kumar. Rakesh Mehra. Vikramjit Roy. Shivani Saran.

Production National Film Development Corporation of India (NFDC).
